test_environment.url: your URL of preview deployment or built bundle from bot-the-builder
test_environment.access: provide credentials for the tester to access the environment

feature.title: The name of the feature to be tested
feature.description: A short description of the feature to be tested
feature.howtofind: Describe where to find the feature to be tested
user_stories: Add 1 or more user stories here which you want the tester to verify
